member.name: M:Oak_Underwriting_Library.FormWithNonClientArea.OnNonClientAreaCalcSize(System.Drawing.Rectangle@,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adjust the supplied Rectangle to the desired position of the client rectangle.

member.name: M:Oak_Underwriting_Library.FormWithNonClientArea.OnNonClientAreaHitTest(System.Drawing.Point)
member.summary: Returns a value from a NCHITTEST enumeration specifing the window element on given point.

member.name: M:Oak_Underwriting_Library.FormWithNonClientArea.OnNonClientMouseMove(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)
member.summary: Delivers new mouse position when it is moved over the non client area of the window.

member.name: M:Oak_Underwriting_Library.FormWithNonClientArea.OnNonClientMouseLeave(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Called when mouse cursor leaves the non client window area.

member.name: M:Oak_Underwriting_Library.FormWithNonClientArea.OnNonClientMouseDown(Oak_Underwriting_Library.NonClientMouseEventArgs)
member.summary: Called each time one of the mouse buttons was pressed over the non-client area.
member.param: NonClientMouseEventArgs contain mouse position, button pressed, and hit-test code for current position.

member.name: M:Oak_Underwriting_Library.FormWithNonClientArea.OnNonClientAreaPaint(Oak_Underwriting_Library.NonClientPaintEventArgs)
member.summary: Paints the client rect - e.ClipingRect has the correct window size, since this.Width, this.Height aren't always correct when calling this methode (because window is actually resizing)

member.name: M:Oak_Underwriting_Library.FormWithNonClientArea.InvalidateWindow
member.summary: This method should invalidate entire window including the non-client area.

member.name: F:Oak_Underwriting_Library.NativeMethods.NCHITTEST.HTERROR
member.summary: On the screen background or on a dividing line between windows (same as HTNOWHERE, except that the DefWindowProc function produces a system beep to indicate an error).

member.name: F:Oak_Underwriting_Library.NativeMethods.NCHITTEST.HTTRANSPARENT
member.summary: In a window currently covered by another window in the same thread (the message will be sent to underlying windows in the same thread until one of them returns a code that is not HTTRANSPARENT).

member.name: F:Oak_Underwriting_Library.NativeMethods.NCHITTEST.HTNOWHERE
member.summary: On the screen background or on a dividing line between windows.

member.name: F:Oak_Underwriting_Library.NativeMethods.NCHITTEST.HTCLIENT
member.summary: In a client area.

member.name: F:Oak_Underwriting_Library.NativeMethods.NCHITTEST.HTCAPTION
member.summary: In a title bar.

member.name: F:Oak_Underwriting_Library.NativeMethods.NCHITTEST.HTSYSMENU
member.summary: In a window menu or in a Close button in a child window.

member.name: F:Oak_Underwriting_Library.NativeMethods.NCHITTEST.HTGROWBOX
member.summary: In a size box (same as HTSIZE).

member.name: F:Oak_Underwriting_Library.NativeMethods.NCHITTEST.HTMENU
member.summary: In a menu.

member.name: F:Oak_Underwriting_Library.NativeMethods.NCHITTEST.HTHSCROLL
member.summary: In a horizontal scroll bar.

member.name: F:Oak_Underwriting_Library.NativeMethods.NCHITTEST.HTVSCROLL
member.summary: In the vertical scroll bar.

member.name: F:Oak_Underwriting_Library.NativeMethods.NCHITTEST.HTMINBUTTON
member.summary: In a Minimize button.

member.name: F:Oak_Underwriting_Library.NativeMethods.NCHITTEST.HTMAXBUTTON
member.summary: In a Maximize button.

member.name: F:Oak_Underwriting_Library.NativeMethods.NCHITTEST.HTLEFT
member.summary: In the left border of a resizable window (the user can click the mouse to resize the window horizontally).

member.name: F:Oak_Underwriting_Library.NativeMethods.NCHITTEST.HTRIGHT
member.summary: In the right border of a resizable window (the user can click the mouse to resize the window horizontally).

member.name: F:Oak_Underwriting_Library.NativeMethods.NCHITTEST.HTTOP
member.summary: In the upper-horizontal border of a window.

member.name: F:Oak_Underwriting_Library.NativeMethods.NCHITTEST.HTTOPLEFT
member.summary: In the upper-left corner of a window border.

member.name: F:Oak_Underwriting_Library.NativeMethods.NCHITTEST.HTTOPRIGHT
member.summary: In the upper-right corner of a window border.

member.name: F:Oak_Underwriting_Library.NativeMethods.NCHITTEST.HTBOTTOM
member.summary: In the lower-horizontal border of a resizable window (the user can click the mouse to resize the window vertically).

member.name: F:Oak_Underwriting_Library.NativeMethods.NCHITTEST.HTBOTTOMLEFT
member.summary: In the lower-left corner of a border of a resizable window (the user can click the mouse to resize the window diagonally).

member.name: F:Oak_Underwriting_Library.NativeMethods.NCHITTEST.HTBOTTOMRIGHT
member.summary: In the lower-right corner of a border of a resizable window (the user can click the mouse to resize the window diagonally).

member.name: F:Oak_Underwriting_Library.NativeMethods.NCHITTEST.HTBORDER
member.summary: In the border of a window that does not have a sizing border.

member.name: F:Oak_Underwriting_Library.NativeMethods.NCHITTEST.HTCLOSE
member.summary: In a Close button.

member.name: F:Oak_Underwriting_Library.NativeMethods.NCHITTEST.HTHELP
member.summary: In a Help button.

member.name: T:Oak_Underwriting_Library.NativeMethods.NCHITTEST
member.summary: Location of cursor hot spot returnet in WM_NCHITTEST.

member.name: F:Oak_Underwriting_Library.NativeMethods.NCCALCSIZE_PARAMS.rectProposed
member.summary: Contains the new coordinates of a window that has been moved or resized, that is, it is the proposed new window coordinates.

member.name: F:Oak_Underwriting_Library.NativeMethods.NCCALCSIZE_PARAMS.rectBeforeMove
member.summary: Contains the coordinates of the window before it was moved or resized.

member.name: F:Oak_Underwriting_Library.NativeMethods.NCCALCSIZE_PARAMS.rectClientBeforeMove
member.summary: Contains the coordinates of the window's client area before the window was moved or resized.

member.name: F:Oak_Underwriting_Library.NativeMethods.NCCALCSIZE_PARAMS.lpPos
member.summary: Pointer to a WINDOWPOS structure that contains the size and position values specified in the operation that moved or resized the window.

member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Oak_Underwriting_Library.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:Oak_Underwriting_Library.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.
